name: MSCRMRestoreOnlineInstance
description: Restores an online instance from a previous backup
author: Wael Hamze

inputs.name: apiUrl
inputs.label: ApiUrl
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use the Service Url as per documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customer-engagement/developer/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api

inputs.name: sourceInstanceName
inputs.label: Source Instance Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name used in the Dynamics 365 domain: https://[instancename].crm[n].dynamics.com

inputs.name: backupLabel
inputs.label: Backup Label
inputs.helpMarkDown: The label of the backup from the source instance to be used for restore into target instance

inputs.name: targetInstanceName
inputs.label: Target Instance Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name used in the Dynamics 365 domain: https://[instancename].crm[n].dynamics.com

inputs.name: waitForCompletion
inputs.label: Wait For Completion
inputs.helpMarkDown: Setting this to true will cause the task to wait until the backup completes

inputs.name: sleepDuration
inputs.label: Sleep Duration (seconds)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The frequency to query the status of the backup job while waiting for completion
